lead_paragraph: BROOKLY.--We copy the following paragraph concerning the rapid growth and present condition of our sister City BROOKLYN, from the Commercial Advertiser. A few years since New-Yorkers very properly considered Brooklyn a small, suburban village: now it is a city of some 120,000 inhabitants! So rapid is the growth of communities in this western world:
